name: Forward stepwise regression
description: Find the best features for building a logistic regression using a greedy algorithm

inputs.name: dataset-id
inputs.description: The data to select features from

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.description: The next feature must increase the f-measure by this much (e.g. 0.05 for an improvement of 5%)

inputs.name: objective-id
inputs.description: Objective field ID, or empty for default dataset objective field

outputs.name: output-features
outputs.description: The list of the best features
